name: Indefinite Project
description:
[In-Development]
Nora is slime princess of Arquis Kingdom turning 17. On her birthday, her father Arukraz held a meeting with Latria, the federation of Demi-Humans. But at the meeting, an attack happens and there unfolds a big conspiracy going on in the world.

Team :
TFGungun - Head Developer and Programmer
Febry G - Story Advisor
Yuki - Mapper
Ali - Mapper
Oktacius - Illustrator
